form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: APPLICATION FOR VERIFICATION OF LAST ENTRY OF AN ALIEN

full_text: Screened by NARA, 4/24/2023 UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE Form approved. Immigration and Naturalization Service Budget Bureau No. 43-R368 APPLICATION FOR VERIFICATION OF LAST ENTRY OF AN ALIEN (See instructions on Reverse) (Fill in with typewriter or print in blook letters in ink) GENERAL Take or mail to- F @@ Stamp IMMIGRATION AND NATURALIZATION SERVICE, 1969 U. S. DEPARTMENT 02 JUSTICE IMMIGRATION & NATURALIZATION SERVICE 300 NORTH LOS ANGELES STREET CUADALAJARA, MEXICO Allen Registration No. LOS ANGELES, CALIFORNIA 90012 A FOIA (b)(6) I request that the American Consul at be furnished a verification of my last lawful admission into the United States for permanent residence to be used in connection with the person(s) listed under item 19 on reverse of form. 1. My name is: (First) (Middle) (Last) Juan Jose 2. Present address: (Number) (Street) (City) Rios Trujillo Code) 236 West Street 4. Place of birth: Colton California 3. Date of birth: 92324 March 29 1936 5. I am a citizen or national of: (Country) Purisima de Bustos, Gto. Mexico Mexico 6. Father's name: 7. Mother's maiden name: Alberto Rios Maria Trujillo INFORMATION IN THESE BLOCKS PERTAIN TO MY LAST ARRIVAL INTO THE UNITED STATES 8. I was admitted under the name of: 9. Port of arrival: Juan Jose Rios Trujillo 10. Date of arrival: (Month) (Day) (Year) 11. Name of vessel or other Tiai of convey yance: 4/22/67 Onifood 12. was 13. My occupation was: At that time I married. was not 14. Last permanent residence before my last arrival was: Laborer, agriculture Purisima de Bustos, Gto. Mexico 15. Name and address of person in the United States to whom I was destined at the time of my last entry was: AMERICAN EMBASSY Lupe Rios, 236 West "0" St., Colton, California 92324. D F. 16. At time of last entry I was accompanied by: None 17. At the time of my last entry I traveled on an immigrant visa a permit to reenter a passport an alien registration receipt card and I have not been absent from the United States since. 18. I was was not in the United States before my last admission for permanent residence (If so give dates of entry and departure) b. C. From From From To To To Form 1-550 OVER (Rev. 1-1-66)
